signup.title: Registration
signup.dataPersonalAccaount: Data for logging in to a personal account
signup.requirements:
Sponsors must have a minimum of seven points, using two or more of these techniques, provided, however, that one point must be for content questions. The content questions may be asked at random points throughout the course or at the end of each chapter or unit.

Student private information, as defined in the personal identification section shall be encrypted. All authentication information shall be protected; for example, it should not be stored or transmitted in clear text.

shippingAddress.title: Fill out personal information
shippingAddress.subTitle: PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION STRICTLY AS appear on the learners permit

partnerCabinet.title: Partner cabinet
partnerCabinet.infoText: Use the below PayPal to pre-pay class fee. Write the student’s name in the «Ship To» part of PayPal

footer.privacyText: *Successful completion of 320-minute Internet course by principal operator of insured vehicle provides 3-year, 10% reduction in base rate of motorist's current car liability, no-fault & collision premiums.**Point reduction benefits can be applied once within 18 months and reduce as many as 4 points from record. Reduced points remain on the driving record but are not counted by NYS DMV against the license. Point reduction does not remove, delete, subtract or erase violations, convictions or points, or prevent or cancel a mandatory revocation or suspension for violations such as DWI, DWAI or three speeding violations within 18 months.

personalData.title: Personal data
personalData.warning: PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION STRICTLY AS appear on the learners permit
personalData.birthdayText: Provide their date of birth as it appears on the individual’s permit

Student private information, as defined in the personal identification section shall be encrypted. All authentication information shall be protected; for example, it should not be stored or transmitted in clear text.
